docs.title: Overview
docs.description: An implementation of GraphQL in Go. Follows the official reference implementation graphql-js.

docs.title: Quick Start
docs.description: The following is a simple example which defines a schema with a single hello string-type field and a Resolve method which returns the string world. A GraphQL query is performed against this schema with the resulting output printed in JSON format.
